timeline.content:
Hi Anasara Renander, üòä

I hope you're doing well! üåü

I'm Aashutush from the UCL Accommodation Portal. I've been trying to get in touch with you regarding the interest you showed in one of the properties, Chapter Kings Cross, London . üè°

Could you please let me know a good time for us to connect? Looking forward to hearing from you! ‚ú®

Thanks a lot! üòä

Best regards,
Ashutush

Speaker A: This is the vodafone voicemail service 407-387-409908. Please leave a message after the tone. When you finish recording, please hang up or press the hash key for more options.
Speaker B: Hi Anasara Ashutosh Thisai from UCO Accommodation Portal. I basically got your inquiry about one of our properties is Chapter Kings Cross, London. So if you want to confirm and you want to book the property, do reply to me over my email or WhatsApp or you can even call me back. Thank you, have a nice day.
